content.text:
HON. JOHN K. DELANEY

                              of maryland

                    in the house of representatives

                       Tuesday, November 7, 2017
content.speaker: None

content.text:
Mr. DELANEY. Mr. Speaker, I was unable to cast my vote on Roll Call 
No. 607, No. 608, and No. 609. Had I been present to vote on Roll Call 
No. 607, I would have voted YEA; Had I been present to vote on Roll 
Call No. 608, I would have voted YEA; Had I been present to vote on 
Roll Call No. 609, I would have voted NAY.
content.speaker: Mr. DELANEY
